name: Blitz (Ship Swap)
description:
A game made for the 2018 Mini-Game Jam. The idea was to only use 4 colors and keep things as minimal as possible... I think... :)

I decided to take things a step further and see how much I could get done in 24 hours. This is the results of that experiment. I went for a classic arcade game (which is kinda the style I love to stick with) where you must switch between two colors, to avoid crashing in to single colored walls.

Red Ship go through red walls. Blue Shop go through blue walls. Simple :D

(Tilde in newer version will toggle between 128x128 and 256x256)

Left/Right arrows moves the ship

Press and hold Down arrow to swap colors

Spacebar fires
